patthana18.6:1.1: Hetuṁ saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.6:3.1: Hetuṁ ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.6:5.1: Hetuṁ oghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.6:7.1: Hetuṁ yogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.6:9.1: Hetuṁ nīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.6:11.1: Nahetuṁ parāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
